240 yards dk weight yarn use 2 strands together throughout *katia marathon color 83324 shown or size i hook or size needed for gauge approximately 240 yards worsted weight yarn use 2 strands together throughout or size k hook 6 500 mm or size needed for gauge approximately 120 yards bulky weight yarn use one strand throughout 5/8 ribbon approximately 1 ½ yards gauge rounds 1 2 = 3 ¼ inches pattern chain 4 join with a slip_stitch to first chain to form a ring round 1 chain 3 11 double_crochet in ring join with a slip_stitch in first double_crochet 12 double_crochet round 2 chain 3 double_crochet in first double_crochet 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet around join with a slip_stitch in first double_crochet 24 double_crochet round 3 chain 3 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet *double_crochet in next double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet* around join with a slip_stitch in first double_crochet 36 double_crochet round 4 chain 3 double_crochet in next double_crochet round 5 round 10 chain 3 double_crochet in next double_crochet and each double_crochet around join with a slip_stitch to first double_crochet 48 double_crochet round 11 chain 3 double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet *double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet* around join with a slip_stitch in next double_crochet* around join with a slip_stitch in first double_crochet 72 double_crochet round 13 chain 3 double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet *double_crochet in next 6 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet* around join with a slip_stitch in first double_crochet fasten_off 96 double_crochet weave in ends attach ribbon hat band as desired if you find any errors or have questions please email me at relynn d johnson@gmail com this pattern is the property of
